game.name: Find Cats 5 天使猫
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 3d 세계에서 길 잃은 고양이의 영혼을 찾는 게임입니다. 주인공은 길 잃은 고양이의 영혼 찾기를 맡은 엔젤 고양이입니다. 게이머는 다른 3d 세계를 탐험하는 엔젤 고양이로 변신해야 합니다!
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a game where players search for the souls of many lost cats in a 3D world. The protagonist is an angel cat responsible for retrieving the souls of lost cats. Players need to play as the angel cat and explore and discover in different 3D worlds!
